title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 297 - Combined Returns, Single Payments Returns And Payments Of Tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 297 - Combined Returns, Single Payments Returns And Payments Of Tax

State Regulations
§ 297.1 - Combined returns and employer's returns
§ 297.2 - Payment of a single amount to the department
§ 297.3 - Returns and payments of tax
§ 297.4 - Nonresident earnings tax returns filed with a joint New York State personal income tax return of a husband and wife
§ 297.5 - Time and place for filing City of New York earnings tax returns and payment of City of New York earnings tax
§ 297.6 - Signing of City of New York earnings tax returns and other documents
§ 297.7 - Change of residence status during the year
§ 297.8 - Extensions of time
§ 297.9 - Requirements concerning returns, notices, records and statements
§ 297.10 - Report of change in Federal taxable income

Subpart 297-1 - Repealed

Subpart 297-2 - Repealed

Subpart 297-3 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. F, pt. 297

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697; General City Law, § 25-n [e]; Administrative Code of the City of New York, §
11-1943

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
